titleStmt.title: A congregational church is a catholike visible church, or, An examination of M. Hudson his vindication concerning the integrality of the catholike visible church wherein also satisfaction is given to what M. Cawdrey writes touching that subject, in his review of M. Hooker's Survey of church discipline / by Samuel Stone ...
titleStmt.author: Stone, Samuel, 1602-1663.
Mather, Samuel, 1626-1671.
Cotton, John, 1584-1652.

notesStmt.note: Cawdrey's remarks on Mr. Hooker's Survey of church discipline occur in his Inconsistencies of the independent way.
"To my Reverend dear brother, M. Samuel Stone" by John Cotton (p. [8]) in verse.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
